definitions.definition: To fit something with a motor .
examples: Most canoe aficionados would argue that motorizing a canoe removes the pleasurable aspects of traveling in one.

definitions.definition: To supply something or someone with motor vehicles .
examples: Once Jack decided to motorize his paper delivery route, he found he could reach far more subscribers.

definitions.definition: To supply armoured vehicles; to mechanize .
examples: The refit plan recommended that the first battalion be motorized to upgrade their offensive capabilities.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To fit something with a motor .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To supply something or someone with motor vehicles .
( transitive ) To supply armoured vehicles; to mechanize .
